mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.familyId as familyId, c.device_sn as deviceSn, c.product_code as productCode, c.realestate_id as realestateId, c.project_id as realestateId, c.havc_error_value as havcErrorValue, c.num_error_value as numErrorValue, c.device_id as deviceId from home_auto_fault_device_current c where c.familyId =#{familyId} and c.device_id = #{deviceId};
